author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds to ```SimFastTiming/FastTimingCommon/test``` a simple program to print and display in the form of ROOT histograms the tabulated BTL pulse shape for a selection of possible amplitudes. Inspired to ```testEcalShape.cpp```.

#### PR validation:

The code correctly dumps the tabulated values, and produces the plot:
![BTLShape](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/assets/4058194/c7619957-2733-4ef1-9185-1bde0efb8dfb)
title: MTD digitization: test code to print and display BTL pulse shape
